text: Georg Michael Hanack (22 October 1931 – 6 November 2019) was a German chemist. He was a Professor emeritus of Chemistry at the University of Tübingen (Germany). Hanack was born in Luckenwalde, Germany. He was best known for his works on vinyl cations and phthalocyanines. He retired in 2001.Tribute to Professor Michael Hanack on the Occasion of his Retirement from the Chair of Organic Chemistry at the University of Tuebingen worldscientific.com 2001 ==References== ==Other websites== * Homepage Working Group of Professor Hanack Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:German chemists
title: Michael Hanack
